channel.title: [Lore Suggestion] Warden's Bludgeon
channel.description: A guard's favorite weapon in the Dungeon of Castle Adiart. Each hand-crafted by the warden, who used these to keep the prisoners. Whether they be Killers, Cultists, or even ones who cared a black rose, everyone who went there would see bludgeon.
